name: Pat (The Pig Cat)
description:
A prototype game for "Pat (The Pig Cat)." A clicker type game that was made for the weekly game jam 119, topic: "tamagotchi." Play as the owner of "Pat" a pig-cat with demands and needs! Make sure his water, is full, hes fed properly, and his happiness is up for special surprises he may leave you.

Upgrade you ability to make cash through upgrades and soon, the ability to add vanity items to Pat!
